<title level="1" right="Trait">[Electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=586)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 455 <sup>2.0</sup>

Effects with this trait deal electricity damage. A creature with this trait has a connection to magical electricity.
name: Electricity
